Web Prices

What are our website prices?

Basic Static One Page

A single page website.,

This option may be the most cost effective for startups. It can ontain all the important information for you to attract customers to your business. (see Demo Page for more).

Multi Page Website

All your information contructed/maintained by me

A website built over several pages that showcase your business and allow customers to contact you from the site. For example, About Us, Contact, etc. (See Demo Page for more)

A full website

A website you maintain

This type of website can be maintained by your business. You can update, add or remove content. This would normally be a Wordpress website with a theme of your choice. I can give training on maintaing the site, if required. (see Demo Page for more)
